custom_css: a {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; /* 垂直居中 */ background-color: white; padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0;}
a img {width: 60%; height: auto; object-fit: contain;}

settings.custom_liquid: BabygliderPH {% if product.collections.size > 0 %} > {{ product.collections.first.title }} {% endif %}

{%- liquid assign previous_product = collection.previous_product assign next_product = collection.next_product if previous_product or next_product else assign collectionList = product.collections[0].handle assign previous_product = nil assign next_product = nil assign last = collections[collectionList].products_count for p in collections[collectionList].products if p.handle == product.handle assign prev = forloop.index | minus: 2 assign next = forloop.index if prev >= 0 assign previous_product = collections[collectionList].products[prev].handle endif if last >= next assign next_product = collections[collectionList].products[next].handle endif break endif endfor endif -%} {%- if previous_product -%} Previous Item {%- endif -%} {%- if next_product -%} Next Item {%- endif -%}

custom_css: a {background-image: linear-gradient( to right, blue, purple ); /* 從藍色到紫色的漸變 */ background-clip: text; -webkit-background-clip: text; color: transparent;}
